description: This file defines a React component for a note-taking application's frontend. It manages user profile retrieval, note fetching, searching, creating, updating, and deleting notes, along with UI rendering.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the API based on the current query and updates the state.

methods.name: startNewNote
methods.description: Initializes the form for creating a new note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves the current note; creates a new one or updates an existing one via API calls.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes the specified note and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: selectNote
methods.description: Selects a note for viewing or editing and populates the form fields.
